testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlSectionControlStatusRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.15 [Need to Verify Section Plan Status] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Section Control Status Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.11.10.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N100R1082_Send_Section_Control_Status_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N100R1082_Send_Section_Control_Status_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Section Control is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.9.3.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N100R1077_Restrictions___Section_Control_Supported = ${TMDD_N100R1077_Restrictions___Section_Control_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier - Section Control Acknowledge is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.9.3.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N100R1078_Operator_Identifier___Section_Control_Acknowledge_Supported = ${TMDD_N100R1078_Operator_Identifier___Section_Control_Acknowledge_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Last Revised Date and Time - Section Control is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.9.3.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N100R1079_Operator_Last_Revised_Date_and_Time___Section_Control_Supported = ${TMDD_N100R1079_Operator_Last_Revised_Date_and_Time___Section_Control_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Timing Mode - Section Control is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.9.3.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N100R1080_Timing_Mode___Section_Control_Supported = ${TMDD_N100R1080_Timing_Mode___Section_Control_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Timing Pattern Identifier - Section Control is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.9.3.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N100R1081_Timing_Pattern_Identifier___Section_Control_Supported = ${TMDD_N100R1081_Timing_Pattern_Identifier___Section_Control_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N100R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N100R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 9 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 11 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 12 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlSectionControlStatusRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N100R1082_Send_Section_Control_Status_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 13 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 13.1 VERIFY that a sectionControlResponseMsg message was received.
Step 13.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.3 VERIFY that a section-id data element exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.4 VERIFY that a request-id data element exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.5 VERIFY that a request-status data element exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.6 VERIFY that a sectionControlResponseMsg message was received.
Step 13.7 IF TMDD_N100R1077_Restrictions___Section_Control_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 13.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.8 IF TMDD_N100R1078_Operator_Identifier___Section_Control_Acknowledge_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 13.8.1 VERIFY that an operator-id data element exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.9 IF TMDD_N100R1079_Operator_Last_Revised_Date_and_Time___Section_Control_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 13.9.1 VERIFY that an operator-last-revised data frame exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.10 IF TMDD_N100R1080_Timing_Mode___Section_Control_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 13.10.1 VERIFY that a request-control-mode data element exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.11 IF TMDD_N100R1081_Timing_Pattern_Identifier___Section_Control_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 13.11.1 VERIFY that a timing-pattern-id data element exists within message sectionControlResponseMsg.
Step 13.12 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 14 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 14.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 14.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 14.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 14.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 14.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 14.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 14.7 IF TMDD_N100R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 14.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 15 EXIT
